allowance(address,address).details: Function to check the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.

params.owner: address The address which owns the funds.
params.spender: address The address which will spend the funds.

allowance(address,address).return: A uint256 specifying the amount of tokens still available for the spender.

balanceOf(address).details: Gets the balance of the specified address.

params.owner: The address to query the balance of.

balanceOf(address).return: An uint256 representing the amount owned by the passed address.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

totalSupply().details: Total number of tokens in existence

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
